thread.section_title: Park South Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Experience
thread.title_full: Great Experience - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kalimr2017
title: Great Experience
text:
Came on a business trip and was so impressed with the location, staff, room and restaurant would not hesitate to stay again when visiting for recreational purposes.
The restaurant is the equivalent of a destination restaurant with great food and wine, and would be a great choice for a cozy romantic meal.
